summary: A test suite that validates the NashMDTrainer component, ensuring that model training proceeds correctly under standard conditions, with parameter‑efficient fine‑tuning (PEFT), reference models, and custom PEFT configurations.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the NashMDTrainer for production use, especially when employing PEFT strategies and reference models, thereby supporting robust model fine‑tuning workflows.
